naslov: Prodaja - Kuća s tri stambene jedinice+garaža+voćnjak - Gornji Bukovac (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Prodaja - Kuća s 3 stambene jedinice + garaža + voćnjak - Gornji Bukovac Prošećite nekrentinom na sljedećem linku: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=tuGEZxkLmj3 Prodajemo kuću površine 195 m2 koja se nalazi na zemljištu od 639 m2 na Gornjem Bukovcu. Kuća se sastoji od prizemlja, kata i potkrovlja te svaki kat predstavlja posebnu stambenu cjelinu koje povezuje unutarnje stubište. Prizemlje se sastoji od: hodnika, dnevnog boravka, kuhinje s blagovaonicom, spavaće sobe, kupaonice i ostave. Kat čine: hodnik, dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i bagovaonicom koji su koncipirani kao open space, zatvorene logge na koju se izlazi iz kuhinje, spavaće sobe s balkonom, kupaonice i ostave. Stanovi u prizemlju i na katu imaju po 75 m2, a potkrovlje je trenutno neuređeni prostor od 45 m2 koji se sastoji od jedne sobe, kuhinje kupaonice i prostrane terase. Grijanje je na peć na drva, a stan na katu ima postavljen i klima uređaj. Stolarija je PVC. Stan u prizemlju je adaptiran 2020. godine te su postavljeni novi podovi i promjenjene instalacije. Kuća ima i manji podrum koji se koristi kao spremište. Kuća ima vrt u dvorištu s ulične strane te dvije prostrane garaže (svaka po 50 m2) i spremište sa stražnje strane gdje se nalazi i prekrasan vrt s voćnjakom gdje je osiguran potpuni mir i tišina. U dvorištu postoji dodatna mogućnost parkiranja. Odlična prilika za Investitore. Neposredna blizina škole, dječjeg vrtića, trgovine, parka Maksimir, a autobusna stanica nalazi se gotovo ispred zgrade. For Sale - House with 3 Residential Units + Garage + Orchard - Gornji Bukovac Take a tour of the property at the following link: Matterport Tour We are selling a house with an area of 195 m², located on a plot of land measuring 639 m² in Gornji Bukovac. The house consists of a ground floor, first floor, and attic, with each floor being a separate residential unit connected by an internal staircase. The ground floor includes: a hallway, living room, kitchen with dining area, bedroom, bathroom, and pantry. The first floor includes: a hallway, living room with kitchen and dining area designed as an open space, a closed loggia accessible from the kitchen, a bedroom with a balcony, a bathroom, and a pantry. The apartments on the ground floor and first floor are each 75 m², while the attic is currently an unfinished space of 45 m², consisting of one room, kitchen, bathroom, and a spacious terrace. Heating is by wood stove, and the first-floor apartment is also equipped with an air conditioner. The windows are PVC. The ground-floor apartment was renovated in 2020, with new flooring and updated installations. The house also has a small basement used as a storage area. The property includes a garden in the front yard, two spacious garages (each 50 m²), and a storage area at the rear, where a beautiful garden with an orchard offers complete peace and quiet. There is additional parking space in the yard. An excellent opportunity for investors. The property is in close proximity to a school, kindergarten, shops, Maksimir Park, and the bus stop is almost right in front of the building. Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb
